title: Organic Compounds - least soluble in water

content.description:
Directions: Each set of lettered choices below refers to the numbered statements immediately following it. Select the one lettered choice that best fits each statement.Â A choice may be used once, more than once, or not at all in each set.

Refer to the following compounds.

(A) CH3CH2CH2CH3

(B) CH3CH2CH2OH

(C) CH3COCH3

(D) CH3COOH
content.question: Is the LEAST soluble in water

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
